impact.tip: Use numbers to show impact: 'Enhanced system performance' becomes 'Reduced system latency by 40% through optimization.'

strategy.tip: Optimize keywords for each role. Tailoring your resume helps pass ATS screens and catches recruiters eyes.

growth.tip: Showcase your growth. Promotions, new responsibilities, or upskilling make your journey compelling.

format.tip: Keep it concise but powerful. Strong verbs and relevant achievements speak volumes.

technical.tip: Add a quick technical summary relevant to the role, making it easy for recruiters to assess your fit instantly.

questions.question: How does CVBABA transform my job search?
questions.answer: CVBABA simplifies and optimizes your job search with an intuitive AI. By interacting with our tool, you can create a compelling resume, a convincing cover letter, or improve an existing document. Our technology transforms your professional experiences into a captivating narrative, allowing you to stand out to recruiters.

questions.question: What makes CVBABA different from other resume builders?
questions.answer: CVBABA stands out for its interactive and personalized approach. Unlike traditional tools that rely on rigid forms, our AI acts as a career coach, helping you highlight your strengths in a unique way. Whether it's for a resume, cover letter, or PDF, we guide you in creating documents that reflect your professional value.

questions.question: How quickly can I create a professional document?
questions.answer: With CVBABA, creating a professional document takes less than 2 minutes. Our AI quickly transforms your information into a resume, cover letter, or high-quality PDF. You save time while getting a professional result, without having to worry about formatting.

questions.question: Which CVBABA plan is right for me?
questions.answer: CVBABA offers plans tailored to your needs, based on a credit system. The higher the plan, the more credits and advanced features you get. The free plan allows you to explore our tools, while higher plans offer more credits to use the AI. PDF editing without AI is unlimited on all plans, allowing you to customize your documents as needed.

questions.question: How often should I update my documents?
questions.answer: We recommend updating your documents with every new professional opportunity. Tailor your resume and cover letter to the job requirements. CVBABA helps you quickly personalize your documents to maximize your chances of success.

questions.question: Are my information safe with CVBABA?
questions.answer: The security of your data is our top priority. CVBABA uses state-of-the-art encryption to protect your information. You can share your experiences and aspirations with confidence, knowing that your data is handled with the utmost confidentiality.

questions.question: What kind of support can I expect?
questions.answer: Our support team is here to guide you every step of the way. Whether you need help creating impactful documents or exploring our features, we are here to assist. Users of higher plans receive personalized support to maximize their experience.

questions.question: How do I get started with CVBABA?
questions.answer: Start now by chatting with our AI. No credit card or complicated signup needed. Whether you want to create a resume, cover letter, or improve a PDF, CVBABA is here to help you get started on your professional transformation. Ready to take action?

keyPoints.title: Key Points
points: We collect account, resume, usage, and technical data.
Your data is used to provide and improve our services.
We implement strong security measures to protect your information.
You have rights to access, rectify, and erase your data.
We do not knowingly collect data from children under 16.

introduction.title: Introduction
content: Welcome to cvbaba.com (the "Site"), owned and operated by BylyAI, the data controller responsible for handling your personal information. For any questions, contact us at support@cvbaba.com.
At CVBABA, we prioritize your privacy and are committed to safeguarding your personal information. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your data.
By using the Site and services offered by CVBaba, you agree to the data practices described in this Privacy Policy. We encourage you to read through it to understand our commitment to your privacy.

informationWeCollect.title: Information We Collect
content: We collect the following types of personal information:

• Account Information: Name, email, credentials, payment details.
  • Resume Content: Information you provide in your resumes.
  • Usage Data: How you interact with our services.
  • Communication Data: Content of your messages to us.
  • Technical Data: IP address, browser type, device information.

howWeUseYourInformation.title: How We Use Your Information
content:
• Provide and improve our resume-building services.
  • Personalize your experience and offer tailored suggestions.
  • Process payments and maintain your account.
  • Communicate with you about our services and updates.
  • Ensure the security and integrity of our platform.
  • Comply with legal obligations.

informationSharing.title: Information Sharing
content: We may share your information with:

• Service providers who help us deliver our services.
  • Legal authorities when required by law.
  • Business partners in the event of a merger or acquisition.
  • Other users, only if you choose to share your resume publicly.

yourRights.title: Your Rights
content:
• Access and receive a copy of your personal data.
  • Rectify inaccurate or incomplete information.
  • Request erasure of your personal data.
  • Object to certain processing of your data.
  • Data portability.
To exercise these rights, contact us at support@cvbaba.com.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
content: We implement robust security measures, including encryption, secure servers, and regular security audits. However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure. We strive to protect your data but cannot guarantee absolute security.

childrensPrivacy.title: Children's Privacy
content: CVBABA is not intended for users under 16. We do not knowingly collect data from children under 16. If we learn we have collected personal data from a child under 16, we will delete this information promptly. If you believe we might have any information from or about a child under 16, please contact us.

changesToThisPolicy.title: Changes to This Policy
content: We may update this policy periodically. We will notify you of any significant changes by posting the new policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date, so please check back regularly!

contactUs.title: Contact Us
content: For any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at support@cvbaba.com.

errors.name: Name is required.
errors.email: A valid email address is required.
errors.subject: Subject is required.
errors.generic: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.

keyPoints.title: Key Points
points: You must be at least 16 years old to use CVBABA.
You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account.
We reserve the right to terminate accounts that violate our terms.
Content you create remains your property, but we have a license to use it.
Our service is provided "as is" without warranties.

acceptanceOfTerms.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptanceOfTerms.content: By accessing or using CVBABA, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you disagree with any part of the terms, you may not access the service.

descriptionOfService.title: Description of Service
descriptionOfService.content: CVBABA provides an AI-powered resume creation and optimization service. We offer tools to create, edit, and enhance resumes for job seekers.

userAccounts.title: User Accounts
userAccounts.content: You must be at least 16 years old to use CVBABA. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password. You agree to accept responsibility for all activities that occur under your account.

userContent.title: User Content
userContent.content: You retain all rights to the content you submit to CVBABA. By submitting content, you grant CVBABA a worldwide, non-exclusive, royalty-free license to use, reproduce, and display your content in connection with the service.

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: The CVBABA service and its original content, features, and functionality are owned by CVBABA and are protected by international copyright, trademark, patent, trade secret, and other intellectual property laws.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We may terminate or suspend your account and bar access to the service immediately, without prior notice or liability, under our sole discretion, for any reason whatsoever, including but not limited to a breach of the Terms.

disclaimers.title: Disclaimers
disclaimers.content: Your use of CVBABA is at your sole risk. The service is provided on an "AS IS" and "AS AVAILABLE" basis. The service is provided without warranties of any kind, whether express or implied.

limitationOfLiability.title: Limitation of Liability
limitationOfLiability.content: In no event shall CVBABA, nor its directors, employees, partners, agents, suppliers, or affiliates, be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential or punitive damages, including without limitation, loss of profits, data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses, resulting from your access to or use of or inability to access or use the service.

governingLaw.title: Governing Law
governingLaw.content: These Terms shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of the US, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.

changesToTerms.title: Changes to Terms
changesToTerms.content: We reserve the right, at our sole discretion, to modify or replace these Terms at any time. We will provide notice of any significant changes by posting the new Terms on this page.

contactUs.title: Contact Us
contactUs.content: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at support@cvbaba.com.

quotes: A blank page is not a void to be filled, but a sacred space where inspiration germinates
Art is born from patience and perseverance, like a flower that blooms slowly
Writing is sculpting time into eternal words - every sentence is a victory over impatience
Perseverance is the bridge between dream and realization
To love is also to know how to wait with grace and confidence
A masterpiece is built second by second, in the alchemy of time and passion
Patience is not passive waiting, but the art of cultivating one's inner garden
On the canvas of life, every brushstroke deserves contemplation
The most beautiful stories are written with the ink of perseverance
In the silence of creation, love and patience dance together
The hand that traces the letters must sometimes rest to better dance with the words
To persevere is to love your dream enough to give it time to mature
The heart of the creator beats to the rhythm of three virtues: patience, perseverance, passion
Between two lines of a poem, hours of silence and attention are hidden
A novel is born from a multitude of 'maybes' transformed into 'yeses' by tenacity
True art is a marathon where every step counts more than the finish line
To love creating is to embrace new beginnings without losing the flame
The most beautiful sculpture is the one that time carves day by day in the soul of the artist
Words will come when they hear the patient heart of the one who waits for them
In the cathedral of creation, every stone is laid with love and obstinacy
